"Smart Mouse" - A mouse that can learn user habits and adjust its movements accordingly to increase productivity and reduce strain on the wrist.
"3D Mouse" - A mouse that allows users to control a virtual environment in three dimensions, allowing for more immersive gaming and simulation experiences.
"Haptic Mouse" - A mouse that provides haptic feedback to the user, simulating the sensation of pressing buttons or moving objects in real life.
"Gesture Mouse" - A mouse that recognizes hand gestures and translates them into commands, making it easier for users to interact with their computer without using a keyboard or touchpad.
"Health Mouse" - A mouse that tracks user activity and provides data on how often they move, sit, and rest throughout the day, helping users improve their posture and overall health.
